# Edward J. Amann Jr.

Edward J. Amann Jr. (July 17, 1925 â€“ July 15, 2009) was an American politician who served in the New York State Assembly from 1953 to 1973.
He died on July 15, 2009, in Staten Island, New York City, New York at age 83.
